Class MecanumDriver

java.lang.Object
t10.novel.mecanum.MecanumDriver
public class MecanumDriver extends Object

    • useGamepad

      public void useGamepad(com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.Gamepad gamepad, double powerMultipler)
      Call this method in loop in tele-op to allow the gamepad to be used for driving.
      Parameters:
      gamepad - The gamepad that controls the robot's movement.
      powerMultipler - Used for micro-movement, set to 0.5 for micro-movement.
